scripts.env:prod:
export $(egrep -v '^#' .env | xargs) && rm .env || true && echo 'RELEASE_CHANNEL=production
BUILD_VERSION='$BUILD_VERSION'
CODE_VERSION='$CODE_VERSION >> .env
scripts.env:stage:
export $(egrep -v '^#' .env | xargs) && rm .env || true && echo 'RELEASE_CHANNEL=stage
BUILD_VERSION='$BUILD_VERSION'
CODE_VERSION='$CODE_VERSION >> .env
scripts.env:development:
export $(egrep -v '^#' .env | xargs) && rm .env || true && echo 'RELEASE_CHANNEL=development
BUILD_VERSION='$BUILD_VERSION'
CODE_VERSION='$CODE_VERSION >> .env
scripts.icon:stage: app-icon label -i icon.png -o assets/icon-stage.png --top STAGE --bottom 1.3.4 && app-icon label -i android-icon.png -o assets/android-icon-stage.png --top STAGE --bottom 1.3.4
scripts.increment:build:
export $(egrep -v '^#' .env | xargs) && rm .env || true && ((BUILD_VERSION++)) && echo 'RELEASE_CHANNEL='$RELEASE_CHANNEL'
BUILD_VERSION='$BUILD_VERSION'
CODE_VERSION='$CODE_VERSION >> .env && echo 'New Build Version: '$BUILD_VERSION
scripts.build:android:prod:old: yarn env:prod && expo build:android -t apk --release-channel production --non-interactive
scripts.build:android:prod: yarn env:prod && yarn icon:prod && eas build --clear-cache --platform android --profile production
scripts.build:android:stage:old: yarn increment:build && yarn env:stage && expo build:android -t apk --release-channel stage --non-interactive
scripts.build:android:stage: yarn env:stage && yarn icon:stage && eas build --clear-cache --platform android --profile stage
scripts.build:ios:prod: yarn env:prod && yarn icon:prod && eas build --clear-cache --platform ios --profile production
scripts.build:ios:stage: yarn env:stage && yarn icon:stage && eas build --clear-cache --platform ios --profile stage
scripts.build:ios:development: yarn env:development && yarn icon:development && cross-env RELEASE_CHANNEL=development eas build --clear-cache --platform ios --profile development
scripts.increment:code:
export $(egrep -v '^#' .env | xargs) && rm .env || true && ((CODE_VERSION++)) && echo 'RELEASE_CHANNEL='$RELEASE_CHANNEL'
BUILD_VERSION='$BUILD_VERSION'
CODE_VERSION='$CODE_VERSION >> .env && echo 'New Code Version: '$CODE_VERSION
scripts.publish:stage: yarn env:stage && yarn increment:code && eas update --branch stage
